channel.title: Need help with 508 server
channel.description:
I need to know how to start the server, I did everything from the guide "how to make a 508 server work" but I can't figure it out, it gets stuck at connecting to update server and then it says error_game_js5connect. I think it's because the server is off, but I'm not sure how to turn it on, and also there is no compiler. There is no run.bat either and I looked for it.
thanks for helping.

item.title: Need help with 508 server

item.description:
@fdsafdsafdsafdsaf wrote:

It’s ok, I got it figured out, now for the programming… (thanks.)
